Inside the other room, you saw a strange looking device on a table with holding straps and something that looked like a padded fly swatter. In front of the device was a small microphone, connected to an odd meter. The woman placed your naked body, belly down, onto the table and strapped you into the device as you struggled and protested. Once you were helplessly pinned down, she adjusted the microphone so it was near your mouth then turned on the meter.

"This is a spanking machine." explained the woman. "It will relentlessly spank your bare bottom with the average strength of an adult female without tire or remorse until you wail and cry exactly like an infant for one full minute. This meter will measure the octave and time you are able to hold it."

"So... all I have to do to get out of this thing is to cry for a minute?" you ask.

The woman gives a low, evil giggle. "Not quite. You see, you have to wail and cry EXACTLY like a baby. Babies cry at a slightly higher octave than your average female girl. Much higher than a boy's normal range but, with pain as a motivation, most boys reach that octave within a few hours."

You look at the woman with horror filling your mind. "Few hours!?!"

"This is your first punishment." said the woman. "Swallow your pride, scream and wail and cry in the octave of an infant for one minute and the machine will stop. I will check up on your progress in one hour."

With that, she turned on the machine and walked out of the room as the swatter came down and struck your bare bottom the first time. It stung, but you were able to take it without much problem. Then the swatter came down again, harder, and you were forced to wince. Again and again, the swatter came down onto your bottom, each time, harder and faster. And down the manhole he fell! It was a slippery slope that felt like a plastic slide with twists and turns and loops! Bill had absolutely no control, so down he went until seemingly landing safely into darkness. The lights turned on, Bill was shocked to see he was in a circular room painted sky blue, with decals of yellow rubber duckies plastered all over the walls!

Then suddenly, two holes opened up on the walls and out came two hoses. The first one that struck smelled like hand sanitizer and soaked Bill all over only to be shocked that somehow all his body hair and clothes were fading out into a liquid that went down a drain on the floor! Another hole opened, out came a metallic arm with a gloved cartoon hand holding a towel that gently swept his body. Then the second hose fired up a yellow sticky substance all over his body, another cartoon hand came out to ensure that it didn't miss a single spot.

Afterwords all the hoses and hands returned and everything was calm for a while. Bill just stood there, naked and yellow. The next surprise was a door opening. Bill was frightened at this point, so first there was nervous hesitation waiting to see what came next. Nothing happened, so he decided to walk through this new path. At one point the light of the room he had left would fade, but he was greeted quickly with another heavily light room and the sight of a girl also dressed like a duck. They both looked at each other, he was stunned, she looked aggravated. She also looked about the same age as him, wearing a dainty pink doll dress and a huge pink bow swung on her bald yellow head. Her beak was on, but then another woman dressed like a cartoon duck walked in and put on her wedded duck feet.

"There we go! How do they feel??" - asked the woman.
"V-very real!" - answered the girl in a worrying tone getting the feel of the feet as she placed them in the ground standing up.
"Oooh now look at the time! I can't believe this took us all day!" - said the woman as she grabbed the girl by the hand and walked off with her. "It's almost 8pm! We have to get you inside your egg! Tomorrow we begin therapy and it's gonna be the start of some really long days for you little missy!"

Bill stood befuddled, he then walked on a long hall where more women were doing the same with all the young and now feeble students of The School of Punishment!

He tried to pull it out immediately, but he took notice of the long sleeves of his new blue sailor outfit! He was horrified to see he was already transformed into the little cartoon duck Mother Goose had designed! Then finally, his silly sailor hat was pressed on him by Mother herself!

Among all that chaos, there was a large mirror in this hall. Mother Goose chuckled as she wrapped an arm around Bill and they both walked to it.
"So...any first impressions??" - she asked.
"This...is...not...happening..!" - Bill answered with an obvious panic at his transformation.
Mother Goose chuckled again. "Listen kid, you're really in for a trip! This only happened because it's what you wanted and you really need to feel some regret over it."
Bill turned his beak at her, for some odd reason, she didn't feel like the same Goose she had spoken to earlier. He also had an odd feeling didn't sound like the type of person who was going to discipline him. She gave him a glance back, took off the reading glasses and smiled at him.

"Come on..." - she instructed, they walked off. "Tomorrow, therapy!"
